films.title: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
films.description: Wow I loved this film so much. It's a masterpiece. It's also a total clusterfuck of insane editing, quotable moments, wild group acting, very upsetting topics, comedy, queer nonsense, camp and a genuinely great all-female rock and roll band. Iconic film, can't wait to watch it again

films.title: La Ley Del Deseo
films.description: Such a delightful Spanish film from the 80s full of gay sex, a young and hot Antonio Banderas, and the most amazing trans character ever. This film is so fun and so wild, with great music

films.title: Baby
films.description: A mongay film about sex workers in Sao Paolo which was kinda entertaining and had really beautiful 'chosen family' moments

films.title: Flow
films.description: It's totally unrealistic for these animals to have this human-like reasoning and deduction!! But I forced myself not to think about that stuff because it's not actually about that. It's about the vibe. This film has no words in it and that is a vibe

films.title: Dear Kelly
films.description: As a fan of Channel 5, a top class youtube channel, I decided to check out their feature film about this right-winger and how he came to be so lost. It's pretty good

films.title: Nosferatu
films.description: Hilarious film, one of the OG horror films where a bunch of tropes come from. I love how Count Orlok travels across Europe in a coffin via raft just so he can suck a German lady's blood. Also this vampire stuff is so sexually charged it's insane

films.title: Female Trouble
films.description: Absolutely insane film, there are no words to describe it. It goes way too far and is hugely inappropriate and very disgusting. I loved it and was hugely entertained for the entire thing

films.title: Lesbian Space Princess
films.description: Mongay always do a showing of the winner of the Teddy Award and this year it was this wacky animated film about lesbians in space. At parts it's hilarious but I did roll my eyes a few times

films.title: Ato Noturno
films.description: Gripping, amazing film about public figures exploring their kink of sex in public. Cheesy film noir soundtrack makes it so funny and enjoyable to watch. I watched it at the Berlinale and I loved it

films.title: Neosagradxs
films.description: My friends Clarer and Miiel made this film!! And I'm in it!! I have two lines speaking in spanish and they are terrible, I am a terrible actor. My apologies to the directors and the viewers

films.title: Boy
films.description: I was so nervous during all of this film because it's so tense but the ending was so beautiful. A Danish queer coming of age film, not an easy watch

films.title: The Substance
films.description: So good. Also the most horrible film I've ever watched. I'm not good with body horror so I'm not sure what I was doing watching this

films.title: It Ends With Us
films.description: Pretty people gazing at each other for two hours, I didn't love it

films.title: Summer of 85
films.description: Standard gay film, was pissed off by one of them randomly acting like a dickhead at the end with no warning

films.title: Coco
films.description: Rewatched this delightful film with Mexicans asking if it's all real and they were like yep. Actually a delightful film

films.title: Pretty Woman
films.description: Rewatched this banger film. Great soundtrack and great vibes. I would also sell my body for Richard Gere

films.title: Wallace and Gromit: Vengeance Most Fowl
films.description: Delightful kids film with lots of funny tropes and references

films.title: Le Comte de Montecristo
films.description: Surprisingly great! Some nonsense in there but is there anything really quite like revenge porn?

films.title: El Senador
films.description: Hilariously bad film set in Brazil, watched at Mongay. Acting so bad it's good. Great moment when the cinema audience gasped at the twist

films.title: Paprika
films.description: Watched this anime film while taking mushrooms thinking it would be trippy and fun but it was just a series of dream sequences without much connecting story. Frustrating watch with a really unpleasant sexual assault scene.

films.title: The Blair Witch Project
films.description: Watched this while taking mushrooms thinking it would be scary but it was actually mainly suspenseful and fun. Too many Americans

films.title: Anora
films.description: Fascinating, thrilling film about a sex worker. I was on the edge of my seat the whole time, highly recommend

films.title: Sunflower
films.description: At Mongay, I love sunflowers but this is just trope-y bullshit with cuts to a sunflower field. Very plain

films.title: Mamantula
films.description: Horror film about a man-spider who eats people after sucking their dicks. Investigation by Spanish speaking lesbian detectives in Berlin. So good for so many reasons, loved it so much

films.title: The Deep Queer Massacre
films.description: Hilarious horror film with a bunch of gays getting picked off one by one in the countryside by an evil trans lady. Loved it

films.title: Des Garçons de Province
films.description: Pretty plain gay film at Mongay but I enjoyed the different vibe to your standard gay film

films.title: Smiley Face
films.description: Hilarious stoner comedy, a bit on the nose but great to watch someone just being so utterly distressed by events. Loved it

films.title: Oldboy
films.description: Pretty wild film about being imprisoned for many years and finally getting out. Pretty grim, also pretty silly

films.title: Dan Savage's Hump Porn Film Festival
films.description: A collection of 25 porn films 5 minutes or less. Fantastic, changed my whole outlook on sex. Life changing

films.title: Milk and Serial
films.description: Very unpleasant watch, about youtube pranksters, a topic I struggle with

films.title: And Then We Danced
films.description: What’s it like to be gay as a Georgian traditional dancer? All the usual tropes

films.title: Patagonia
films.description: Gay film in Italy pretty different to your average Mongay. Has a wild scene where he pisses on him.

films.title: Love Lies Bleeding
films.description: Watching this with a cinema full of lesbians was hilarious. It's brutal and hilarious

films.title: Crossing
films.description: Amazing and eye opening story about a Georgian women meeting a community of trans women in Istanbul. Highly recommend

films.title: Problemista
films.description: Silly film about a difficult person and how hard it is to emigrate to the US. Light hearted and easy to watch. A pleasure

films.title: Lose Your Head
films.description: Set in Berlin! Wasn't too bad. About gays and murder

films.title: The Wedding Banquet
films.description: Hilarious, wild film about a man in a gay relationship marrying a woman for a green card

films.title: The Women
films.description: Old film about women fawning around, it was pretty entertaining

films.title: Challengers
films.description: Very sexually charged film about tennis. I found it a bit cringe but it had its moments

films.title: Like it is
films.description: Interesting older gay film with some brutal scenes. Pretty forgettable

films.title: Le Paradis
films.description: Pretty boring gay film about a youth detention centre in France. One cool part where he freestyle rapped but even that felt out of place

films.title: Liuben
films.description: A sad gay film about Roma people in Bulgaria. Eye opening

films.title: Love is the Devil
films.description: Film about Francis Bacon, hated it and hate him

films.title: A Strange Way of Life
films.description: Short film about gay cowboys. Pedro Pascal's in it and it's fucking great

films.title: The Human Voice
films.description: Short film with Tilda Swinton being dramatic on the phone. It's so good

films.title: Anatomy of a Fall
films.description: Thrilling, gripping film about a murder trial in France. Insane

films.title: La Huella de unos Labios
films.description: Sexy Mexican film about an alternative covid pandemic reality. Interesting but also pretty random

films.title: All Shall be Well
films.description: Stunning film about older lesbians in Hong Kong. I cried and cried

films.title: Wikiriders
films.description: Arty film about looking for rich guys in Mexico. The film feels unfinished because they apparently met him but couldn't show it for some reason

films.title: Miller's Girl
films.description: Bad film about an older guy and how he fancies a minor. So icky and horrible

films.title: All of Us Strangers
films.description: Loved this film so much. A gay man's hot new relationship with Paul Mescal and his old relationship with his suspiciously young parents. Love love love

films.title: Oppenheimer
films.description: What a snooze fest. This film is for people who think they're smart. They all speak too quickly and it's too long.

films.title: In Bed
films.description: Really good film set almost entirely in a bedroom during a dramatic time about a hot gay guy who spirals downwards

films.title: Horseplay
films.description: Deeply harrowing film about lads on holiday. Explains the deep rooted homophobia in Argentina

films.title: Wir Werden Unsterblich Sein
films.description: Hilariously bad film from Saarland. A gay thriller with terrible acting and editing

films.title: Arrête Avec tes Mensonges
films.description: Boring film about an old french famous person who used to love a man

films.title: Golden Delicious
films.description: Cheesy American gay film nonsense

films.title: Where Butterflies Don't Fly
films.description: Gay schoolteacher and pupil trapped in a cave together. Really well handled and suspenseful, enjoyable film

films.title: The Beast in the Jungle
films.description: Cool view into a Paris nightclub over the years but didn't take away much else from this film

films.title: Burning Days
films.description: Small town Turkey with a pretty interesting plot. I enjoyed it. Gay themes

films.title: Fallen Leaves
films.description: Beautiful film about poverty in Finland. Has a heavy 60s/70s vibe but is in the present day

films.title: Rotting in the Sun
films.description: Film about gay expats in Mexico, definitely saw myself in it. It was hilarious and wild. Loses tension a bit in the second half

films.title: Passages
films.description: Like it's good, but I didn't enjoy it. Something about films with unlikeable main characters

films.title: Drifter
films.description: This is about a boring countryside gay man becoming a Berlin queer. I really saw myself in him

films.title: Heartbeats
films.description: Film about a gay guy and a girl falling in love with the same hot guy. Some hilarious moments, highly enjoyable

films.title: Concerned Citizen
films.description: A film about gay men gentrifying a poor neighbourhood in Israel which hit me hard because I feel strongly about this topic

films.title: Firebird
films.description: What's it like to be gay in the Russian military, except they don't even speak Russian!

films.title: Asteroid City
films.description: Silly film leaning heavily into the vibes but was actually kinda boring to watch

films.title: Mon Crime
films.description: Fantastic lesbian nonsense! Delicious french film about women being successful

films.title: Bis ans Ende der Nacht
films.description: Cool film about a trans woman and an interesting plot. Also quite forgettable

films.title: Große Freiheit
films.description: This film totally stayed with me, even though the Austrian characters were hard to understand without subtitles. At the end when he goes cruising is very hard hitting

films.title: The Swimmer
films.description: What's it like being gay in an Israeli swimming team? Not that inspiring

films.title: El Houb
films.description: Devastating esposé on homophobic Arabic culture in Morocco. A strong willed man is determined to make his family understand that gay is fine

films.title: The Super Mario Movie
films.description: Loved it. As a Nintendo fan this was a must watch. Why the fuck did they have licensed music in it

films.title: Roter Himmel
films.description: Mongay film where the main dude is so unlikeable and so rude to the other characters that it affects the enjoyment of the film

films.title: The Whale
films.description: Devastating film. Ugly sobbing in the aeroplane. Watching him shovel in the food in such a self destructive way as a response to his self hatred is so painful

films.title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
films.description: So cringe but I have to admit that I laughed a lot. It's a film about Nick Cage.

films.title: Lucky Strike
films.description: Korean thriller, it was good but I was sleepy on a plane watching it. Not very memorable

films.title: Tár
films.description: Great music, compelling story. Weird and uncomfortable world of conducting orchestras. The film is way too long

films.title: Orlando
films.description: So boring, a theatre type film about Virginia Woolf and trans people

films.title: Dipped in Black
films.description: Kinda boring depiction of transness in native American communities

films.title: Past Lives
films.description: Great opening scene. Loved humanising the American ‘villain’ character. Memorable film

films.title: Futur Drei
films.description: Delightful film about second generation Iranian kids in Germany. Eye opening

films.title: The Blue Caftan
films.description: Lovely film set in Morocco about embroidery. Just lovely. Quite long

films.title: The Menu
films.description: Didn't understand the point of this film. Why did she order a burger and why was it such a big deal

films.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
films.description: Deeply upsetting film about depression in rural Ireland. Very beautiful

films.title: Lonesome
films.description: A bit over the top gay film set in Australia. This was my second ever Kino-cumshot

films.title: In from the Side
films.description: Fun film about a gay rugby team, but which featured absolutely no homophobia. It gets a high score from me because the main dude is so hot
